Date: 2024-10-25 16:43
Subject: Are you ready for The Skincare Edition: Unfiltered?
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/xfRDhWiEq0iKPaz-DEHwQA/550555/276ECFE6DBE5AE310AF906154CDB7784/imafge001.png>

The Skincare Edition: Unfiltered is the first of its kind skincare event in the region taking place from October 30th to November 3rd, 2024, in Riyadh’s JAX District. 

Brought to you by Chalhoub Group in partnership with Hia Hub 4.0, this exclusive event brings together leading global brands, industry experts, and skincare enthusiasts to explore the latest innovations and trends shaping the future of beauty and skincare. 


BOOK YOUR TICKET NOW! <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fwww.hiahub.com%252f%2523section-tickets%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWZygkzk7vCDH%252f%252bI1OVaLNNlPYs8nKUBXXgxDexcwgr%252bd4vR2oNPtcaJHMeoZzZpWlD2g3yr8Nv6xodMHvA7kfCiHihQfe6F9iVD0p16ay6zJOQtg95VOatPjw9rSEYrosGaE0kglz%252fdUWWEIKnaXnvF2kEKw%252bjgzGUdIebDPSkkTPEch5iDd7yUy35RfNSCafX3zZXtDSFSNJA4n6XmNH3RINsWT9rHHCu6PQMn9mJtE&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C2e1871fc1dbf4823a7a408dcf4f2a00b%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638654570131964640%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=9keLNQ3nEJQX8caCWQgbo0kuD92k2E9Fkx4d%2FFa1%2F48%3D&reserved=0>
